data.eml:eml: Description of Barbus teugelsi sp. nov. (Cypriniformes: Cyprinidae) from the Little Scarcies basin in Guinea, Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bamba, Mamadou, Vreven, Emmanuel J., Snoeks, Jos (2011): Description of Barbus teugelsi sp. nov. (Cypriniformes: Cyprinidae) from the Little Scarcies basin in Guinea, Africa. Zootaxa 2998: 48-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.204566
